Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Even though i came right before closing, i was asked to wait a few minutes longer so my pasta could be made fresh. It was a takeaway order and i got a bag of bread and dip free of charge. The carbonara was well made, i asked for extra pepper and they delivered! Ill come back again next time :)

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Food was ok! Plenty of food, including vegan options. Service too slow when busy tho

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Cute restaurant and friendly waitress. The pizza was super dry though, which isn't really how I like my Pizza, and the Gnocchi weren't special. All in all: if you cant decide for anything else you'll find something here, but I definitely wouldn't recommend it.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Ordered foods twice at this place. First time the ordered was cancelled after an hour waiting with no further message. ‚Ä¶

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Nice service. The waitress was really lovely. ( the one that helped us in English) the food took over one hour to be ready so that was disappointing. The gnocchi was delicious and the meat ( escalopini) option was ok.  It is a good place if you are looking into lower price and average food.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text:
The gnocchi from the oven was very tasty and the carbonara was very italian! Like without cr√®me, Lovely :)
The owner was very kind and was working very hard. Very laid back atmosphere

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Great service with friendly people::) definitely recommend and would come again :)))  Edward and Marina was very sweet and gentle with us :)))

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Ordered a salad, very small portion and the vegetables were not fresh. Not worth the price. The service was really slow.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text:
Very kind and lovely waitress! :)
Cute, small and quite restaurant

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: This place is a hidden gem! You can easily pass by it without noticing Il Boccalino sign even though it's located on a very busy shopping street. But in my opinion it's the best pizza place in the city. We've been ordering pizza from here ‚Ä¶

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text:

The bruschetta was untoasted white bread  with a little bit of pesto and some ‚Ä¶

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Had a takeaway pizza from here, really tasty and good value. Staff were very friendly as I ordered too

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Had a great Time Here. Delicious Italian Food and a good vibe. Can totally recommend

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Ordered 40 min before they close. Canceled our order 30 minutes after, leaving us without any option since all the other restaurants were closed as well by that time. No problem with an order being canceled but do it right away or change your opening times.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: If you're searching at night for anything to eat it's an ok place to go to, no high expectations tho. Pizza is too crunchy on the outside and not properly baked on the inside, calzone was mainly filled with onions and barely any ham/other ‚Ä¶

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: They just re-opened and it's really worthwhile. The good is delicious and gives you the real Italian feel. Not a really stylish interior, but perfect for a simple Italian meal. We had spaghetti putanesce and vegetarian lasagne big portions and good taste. Service very friendly and helpful. I can recommend it!

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Best pizza in the town very Italian . I'm addicted to this restaurant üòç

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Amazing value for money and friendly waiters / waitresses.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Very delicious homemade Italian food, nice atmosphere, kind staff and a fair price. Highly recommend. Would definitely come again :)

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: We got a table of two and ordered two pizzas and one starter. After ONE HOUR waiting with no feedback, we asked about our food, since tables arriving later were already finishing their main course and they were preparing pizzas to go to new ‚Ä¶

Name: Il Boccalino

Review Text: Told then we had a reservation and they yelled at us saying "we're full".

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: They cook for a long time. Tea is bad. The Internet is fast.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: The food was very delicious and enough for everybody. The prices are really fair and not too much. The staff were really friendly.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Absolute rip-off! Disgusting how you can charge 12EUR for a full size pizza? That is not even a full size! I can do better job in heating a frozen pizza from a supermarket. It shouldn't even have a status as restaurant, but simple cheap take-away. Don't go here

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Avoid like the plague. The waiter would keep trying to push unwanted food and bring more food than explicitly‚Äã asked (and charging for the unwanted extra). The food was salty and tasted like straight from the supermarket. The high price didnt match the low quality of the food. Very bad experience overall.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: We visit Amsterdam twice a year for IBC and ISE show. we always come this sweet Italian restaurant at first day and last day. Because of there are great foods and friendly service:) And the restaurant owner always treat us with heart and provide wonderful foods and service for us.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Pizza and calzone were average. The 4 stagioni salad was terrible, lettuce, rocket, tomato, cucumber and mozzarella, not the usual 4 stagioni ingredients (see picture). Staff was friendly and price was good for the area (you get what you pay for I guess!).

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: Good prices, good pizza in a quaint and cozy setting. The only downfall is that there always seems to be only one waiter even even the place is jammed, making the service a bit lacking.

Name: Il Boccalino
Review Text: It could've used some seasoning, it's probably better in the restaurant but when I ordered through uber eats we needed to add a kilo of salt
